title: How To Invest in Crypto
description: Bitcoin and other crypto-currencies are now worth $2 trillion. Daren Fonda, senior writer at Barron's, and Matt Hougan, chief investment officer at Bitwise Asset Management, discuss crypto-investing trends, from Bitcoin to Ethereum.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Bitcoin and other crypto-currencies are now worth $2 trillion. Daren Fonda, senior writer at Barron's, and Matt Hougan, chief investment officer at Bitwise Asset Management, discuss crypto-investing trends, from Bitcoin to Ethereum.
